value.title: Microsoft Buying Burlington-Based Speech Recognition Company Nuance In $16 Billion Deal

value.title: Microsoft reportedly in talks to buy AI company Nuance Communications
value.excerpt: Microsoft is in talks to acquire AI and speech company Nuance Communications in a deal that would value the company at about $16 billion, Bloomberg reported Sunday. The Burlington, Massachusetts-based company's technology helped launch Apple's digital assistant Siri.
